players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
You killed Diana.
Be careful, Bob knows you're the mafioso.
The villager Diana was found dead this morning.
You said: I was deeply saddened by Diana's untimely demise. Let us focus on finding the real culprit behind this heinous act.

Bob: Alice, I'm glad you're concerned about finding the real culprit. Let's all keep an open mind and share any suspicious behaviors or observations we may have had during the past nights. I'll start: Alic...
